Pieter Bruegel il Vecchio:
{{Infobox Artist | tiền tố = | name = Pieter Bruegel | tên gốc = | nền = họa sĩ | image = Pieter Bruegel the Elder - The Painter and the Buyer, 1565 - Google Art Project.jpg | imagesize = 250px | caption = Bruegel's ''The Painter and The Connoisseur'' drawn c. 1565 is thought to be a self-portrait | nghệ danh = | birthname = Pieter Brueghel | birthdate = c. 1525 | location = Breda, present-day Netherlands or Bree, present-day Belgium, Duchy of Brabant | deathdate = [[9 tháng 9]], [[1569]] | deathplace = Brussels, Duchy of Brabant | nationality = [[Flemish people|Flemish]] | nghề nghiệp = | field = [[Hội họa]], [[đồ họa in ấn]] | training = | movement = [[Dutch and Flemish Renaissance painting|Renaissance]] | works = ''[[Dulle Griet]]'' (c. 1562)
''[[The Peasant Wedding]]'' (1568) | patrons = | influenced by = [[Hieronymous Bosch]] | influenced = | awards = }} '''Pieter Bruegel the Elder''' (tiếng Hà Lan: ''Pieter Bruegel de Oude''; tiếng Ý: ''Pieter Bruegel il Vecchio''; Pieter Bruegel già) (c. 1525 – [[9 tháng 9]], [[1569]]) là một họa sĩ thuộc trường phái [[Phục hưng Hà Lan]] (một nhánh của [[Phục Hưng phương Bắc]]) và là một nhà [[đồ họa in ấn]]. == Tác phẩm == {{Bài chính|Danh sách tranh vẽ của Pieter Bruegel Già}} [[Tập tin:Bruegel, Pieter de Oude - De val van icarus - hi res.jpg|nhỏ|''[[Phong cảnh khi Icarus rơi|Landscape with the Fall of Icarus]]'' (c. 1558)]] [[Tập tin:Pieter Brueghel the Elder - The Dutch Proverbs - Google Art Project.jpg|nhỏ|''[[Netherlandish Proverbs]]'', 1559, with peasant scenes illustrating over 100 [[proverb]]s]] [[Tập tin:Pieter Bruegel the Elder - The Tower of Babel (Vienna) - Google Art Project - edited.jpg|nhỏ|''[[The Tower of Babel (Brueghel)|The Tower of Babel]]'' (1563) oil on board]] [[Tập tin:Pieter brueghel the elder-children playing-detail.jpeg|nhỏ|A detail of ''[[Children's Games (Breughel)|Children's Games]]'' (1560)]] [[Tập tin:Pieter Bruegel the Elder - Peasant Wedding - Google Art Project.jpg|nhỏ|''[[The Peasant Wedding]]'' (1568)]] [[Tập tin:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 107.jpg|nhỏ|''[[Winter Landscape with a Bird Trap]]'' (1565)]] * ''[[:image:bigfishlittlefish.JPG|Large Fish Eat Small Fish]]'', 1556, [[Albertina]], [[Viên]] * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 031.jpg|Naval Battle in the Gulf of Naples]]'', 1560, [[Galleria Doria-Pamphili]], [[Roma]] * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel the Elder - The Fall of the Rebel Angels.JPG|The Fall of the Rebel Angels]]'', 1562, [[Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium]], Brussels * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 076.jpg|The "Little" Tower of Babel]]'', c. 1563, [[Museum Boymans-van Beuningen]], [[Rotterdam]] * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 007.jpg|The Procession to Calvary]]'', 1564, [[Kunsthistorisches Museum]], Vienna * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel Adoration of Magi.jpg|The Adoration of the Kings]]'', 1564, [[The National Gallery, London]] * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 022.jpg|Massacre of the Innocents]]'', c. 1567, versions [[Royal Collection]], [[Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna]], and London art market (2007) * ''[[:Image:Brueghel the elder - winter landscape with a bird trap.jpg|''Winter Landscape with a Bird Trap'']]'', 1565, [[Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium]], Brussels, inv. 8724 * ''Landscape with Christ and the Apostles at the Sea of Tiberias'', 1553, probably with [[Maarten de Vos]], private collection * ''Ass at School'', 1556, drawing, [[Print room]], [[Berlin State Museums]] * ''Parable of the Sower'', 1557, Timken Museum of Art, [[San Diego]] * ''[[Phong cảnh khi Icarus rơi|Landscape with the Fall of Icarus]]'', c.1554-55, Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium, Brussels - Note: No longer seen as an authentic Bruegel Painting[http://www.vrtnieuws.net/cm/vrtnieuws.net/cultuurmedia/kunsten/071017Icarus_nietauthentiek deredactie.be]{{Fact|date=November 2007}} * ''[[Netherlandish Proverbs]]'', 1559, - [[Gemäldegalerie (Berlin)|Gemäldegalerie]], Berlin * ''[[The Fight Between Carnival and Lent]]'', 1559, [[Kunsthistorisches Museum]], [[Viên]] * ''Portrait of an Old Woman'', 1560, [[Alte Pinakothek]], Munich * ''[[:Commons:Image:Children.jpg|Children's Games]]'', 1560, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''Temperance'', 1560 * ''Saul (Battle Against The Philistines On The Gilboa)'', 1562, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''Two Small Monkeys'', 1562, Staatliche Museen, Gemäldegalerie, Berlin * ''[[The Triumph of Death]]'', c. 1562, [[Bảo tàng Prado|Museo del Prado]], [[Madrid]] * ''[[Dull Gret|Dulle Griet (Mad Meg)]]'', c. 1562, Museum Mayer van den Bergh, [[Antwerpen|Antwerp]] * ''[[The Tower of Babel (Brueghel)|The Tower of Babel]]'', 1563, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''Flight To Egypt'', 1563, [[Courtauld Institute Galleries]], [[Luân Đôn|London]] * ''The Death of the Virgin'', 1564, [[Upton House]], Banbury, Oxfordshire, UK * ''The Months''. A cycle of probably 6 paintings of the months or seasons, of which five remain: ** ''[[The Hunters in the Snow]] (Dec.-Jan.)'', 1565, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna ** ''[[The Gloomy Day]] (Feb.-Ma.)'', 1565, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna ** ''[[The Hay Harvest]] (June-July)'', 1565, Lobkowicz Palace at the Prague Castle Complex, [[Cộng hòa Séc]] ** ''[[The Harvesters]] (Aug.-Sept.)'', 1565, [[Metropolitan Museum of Art]], [[Thành phố New York|New York]] ** ''[[The Return of the Herd]] (Oct.-Nov.)'', 1565, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''The Calumny of Apelles'', 1565, drawing, [[Bảo tàng Anh|British Museum]], London * ''The Painter and the Connoisseur'', drawing, c. 1565, [[Albertina]], Vienna * ''Preaching Of John The Baptist'', 1566, [[Museum of Fine Arts (Budapest)]] * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 087.jpg|Census at Bethlehem]]'', 1566, Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium, Brussels * ''The Wedding Dance'', c. 1566, [[Detroit Institute of Arts]], [[Detroit]] * ''Conversion Of Paul'', 1567, Kunsthistorishes Museum, Vienna * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel the Elder - The Land of Cockaigne.JPG|The Land of Cockaigne/Land Of Milk And Honey]]'', 1567, [[Alte Pinakothek]], [[München|Munich]] * ''[[The Magpie on the Gallows]]'', 1568, [[Hessisches Landesmuseum]], [[Darmstadt]] * ''The Misanthrope'', 1568, [[Museo di Capodimonte]], [[Napoli|Naples]] * ''[[The Blind Leading the Blind]]'', 1568, [[Museo Nazionale di Capodimonte]], Naples * ''[[The Peasant Wedding]]'', 1568, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 014.jpg|The Peasant Dance]]'', 1568, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel d. Ä. 024.jpg|The Beggars]]'', 1568, [[Bảo tàng Louvre|Louvre]], [[Paris]] * ''The Peasant and the Nest Robber'', 1568, Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna * ''The Three Soldiers'', 1568, [[The Frick Collection]], [[Thành phố New York|New York City]] * ''[[:Image:Pieter Bruegel the Elder - Storm at Sea.JPG|The Storm at Sea]]'', an unfinished work, probably Bruegel's last painting. == Gia phả == == Liên kết ngoài == {{thể loại Commons|Pieter Bruegel (I)}}[http://www.owlstand.com/#/exhibitions/9c183517-9325-414d-9c08-2e06def37630 Ba bức tranh từ các "nông dân Bruegel"] {{Webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180906125028/http://www.owlstand.com/#/exhibitions/9c183517-9325-414d-9c08-2e06def37630 |date=2018-09-06 }}{{Wikisource1911Enc|Breughel, Pieter}} * [http://www.owlstand.com/exhibition/room/9c183517-9325-414d-9c08-2e06def37630 Tác phẩm của Pieter Bruegel the Elder] {{Webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150924062834/http://www.owlstand.com/exhibition/room/9c183517-9325-414d-9c08-2e06def37630 |date=2015-09-24 }} == Tham khảo == {{tham khảo|30em}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bruegel the Elder, Pieter}} [[Thể loại:Pieter Brueghel|*]] [[Thể loại:Sinh năm 1525]] [[Thể loại:Mất năm 1569]] [[Thể loại:Người Breda]] [[Thể loại:Sinh thập niên 1520]] [[Thể loại:Họa sĩ Phục hưng|Brue]] [[Thể loại:Họa sĩ Hà Lan]]
